EmailTemplate.name: Agreement Office365 Review Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Name} is submitted for your review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Reviewer,
{!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.OwnerFullName} has requested review of the following documents via Office 365 online. Note: If you are an internal user, you can also open and review the document in Microsoft Word on your desktop. {{SharePointUrl}}
After you complete the review, please notify {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.OwnerFullName} via any communication channel such as email or chat. {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.OwnerFullName} will end the review cycle in the CLM application and the access to the document will be revoked.
Note that the attached supporting documents are just for reference.
Thanks, Conga CLM
